name: UniScale Strong
author: kim2091
description:
Category: Universal Models
Purpose: Universal Upscaler

UniScale strikes a nice balance between sharpness and realism. This model can upscale almost anything well. It was originally intended to upscale game textures, but was expanded into a universal upscaler. Interp is these two models interpolated.
dataset: Custom Dataset consisting of lossless 4k frames from Metal Arms: Glitch in the System, Just Cause 3, Dirt 3, Forza Horizon 3, Sleeping Dogs, and self-edited photos from SignatureEdits
